columns.name: root
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a root configuration.

columns.name: inheritable
columns.description: Indicates if the configuration is inheritable.

columns.name: inheriting
columns.description: Indicates if the configuration is inheriting from another.

columns.name: inherits
columns.description: List of configurations this one inherits from.

columns.name: locked
columns.description: Indicates if the configuration is locked.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The environment associated with the configuration.

columns.name: project
columns.description: The project associated with the configuration.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: The slug identifier for the configuration.
